text: hi my name is mark kalas
principal product manager with amazon s3
as you use amazon s3 to manage large
shared data sets
across tens to hundreds of accounts and
buckets in multiple regions
it becomes more and more important to
gather complete and up-to-date
information about your storage
to make decisions or to implement
optimizations to gain holistic insight
into your storage
we've created s3 storage lens an
analytics feature for gaining visibility
into your s3 usage and activity and for
receiving recommendations to improve
cost efficiency
and apply data protection best practices
s3 storage lens is the first
cloud storage analytics solution to
provide a single
organization-wide view of object storage
usage and activity metrics
presented in a convenient dashboard
interface with drill downs to generate
insights
at the region storage class bucket or
even prefix level
and drawing from s3's many years of
experience managing storage for
customers
s3 storage lens analyzes these metrics
to automatically deliver recommendations
to optimize your storage with the
interactive dashboard you can analyze up
to 15 months of historical data
you can also receive call outs for
outlier data points and receive
text-based recommendations contextually
placed alongside metrics to indicate the
action you can take based on the metric
insights provided by s3 storage lens can
be used to answer top-line questions
like how much storage you have or what
are your fastest growing buckets or
prefixes
or you can use recommendations from s3
storage lens to identify ways to reduce
storage costs
or conform to data protection best
practices for more information on s3
storage lens
please visit our website and thanks for
watching
